statement.p: In 16.67 of the last 48 days it rained. How many days did it not rain? days

solution.p: We recall that a percent as a decimal is part/whole. Here that is \displaystyle\frac{{P}}{{48}}={0.1667}. We solve for P by multiplying by \displaystyle{48}. \displaystyle{P}={0.1667}\cdot{48}={8.0016}. We round that as requested to 8 to find the days it rained. How many days did it NOT rain?
